product_description: Luminous nubuck kicks up the look of a sporty low-top sneaker grounded on a sole that curves and flares and features a gum-colored tread with rugged lugs.
product_details_and_care:
Luminous nubuck kicks up the look of a sporty low-top sneaker grounded on a sole that curves and flares and features a gum-colored tread with rugged lugs.
